comments.raw_text:
Ctrl+click behavior (dropping right-click menu) overrides other ctrl+<key>+click behavior. For example, ctrl+command+click still brings up the right-click menu.

Expected behavior is for only ctrl+click to bring up the drop-down menu (consistent with right-click behavior in OS). Should not hijack other ctrl+<key>+click shortcuts.

Works as expected in other browsers (Safari, Chrome).

comments.text:
Oh interesting, on testing iTunes, seems to be the case that context menu pops up, as well as iCal and Mail. Terminal does not, though.

The ones I happened to try were iTerm, Preview, Chrome, and Safari, all of which did not pop up a context menu.

Perhaps not such a bug then, as Lion apps do not seem to handle the cmd+ctrl+click consistently anyways. Perhaps a future feature.
